sentences.english: The present invention discloses one kind of electric roaster capable of controlling the oil content of cooked food.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种可控制烹饪食物油脂的电烤炉。

sentences.english: Open Son of Hibachi making sure the handles are in proper position and locked.
sentences.chinese: 翻开烤烤炉，确认手把位置以及能否固定了。

sentences.english: That day the George Foreman grill was born.
sentences.chinese: 那天便是拳王智烤炉诞生的日子。

sentences.english: The dinner spoiled because he put the stove on too high.
sentences.chinese: 这顿饭算是给毁了，因为他把烤炉的温度调得太高了。

sentences.english: After the agaves are crushed at the distillery, why are they loaded into a hornos?
sentences.chinese: 当龙舌兰在酒厂被压榨后，为什么要被放进烤炉中呢？

sentences.english: A dish just out of the oven, I accidentally burned.
sentences.chinese: 有一次端盘子出烤炉，我不小心烫伤了。

sentences.english: Bake the chicken for another 8 mins at 180'C.
sentences.chinese: 将鸡胸肉放入烤炉，以180度高温烤8分钟。

sentences.english: The meat is roasting in the oven.
The hot coals are spread over the floor of the oven.
sentences.chinese: 热煤铺放在烤炉的底部。

sentences.english: Direct from the oven, the tortillas accumulate in new counter- stackers .
sentences.chinese: 直接从烤炉，积累的饼在新的堆垛。

sentences.english: Electric heating-tube is the normal elements to be used in the electric oven.
sentences.chinese: 电热管是传统电烤炉上常用的加热元件。

sentences.english: Without grabbing a handful of pretzels to munch on, I place my pretzel crust into the oven.
sentences.chinese: 把椒盐脆饼粒放进烤炉，切忌不要先抓把尝尝口味。

sentences.english: Barbecue away from shrubs or trees.
sentences.chinese: 户外烧烤炉应该远离灌木丛或者树林。

sentences.english: The George Forman Grill became the best selling electric appliance in history.
sentences.chinese: 拳王智烤炉成为有史以来最销量最好的电动厨具。

sentences.english: These recipes will draw you up for a longer time against the slow warmth of the oven.
sentences.chinese: 这些食谱将使你花费更多时间在缓慢加热的烤炉上。
放入烤炉中烘烤20分钟左右。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
to scorch/(of the sun) to beat down on
